text: The Men's 200m butterfly event at the 2010 South American Games was held on March 27, with the heats at 10:26 and the Final at 18:05. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Leonardo de Deus '''' |Andres Felipe Torres '''' |Andres Jose Gonzalez '''' |} ==Records== {| class="wikitable" width=75% |- !colspan="5"|Standing records prior to the 2010 South American Games |- |World record | |1:51.51 |Rome, Italy |29 July 2009 |- |Competition Record | |2:03.04 |Buenos Aires, Argentina |17 November 2006 |- |South American record | |1:53.92 |Rio de Janeiro, Brazil |8 May 2009 |} ==Results== ===Heats=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%" style="width:35em;" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
